323a4(nyi khri): rje chen po la/ la la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par bskul lo/ /la la ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su grub par bya ba la yang dag
323a5(nyi khri): par bskul lo/ /la la ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par bskul lo/ /la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la/ la la ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/ la la
323a6(nyi khri): ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/ la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la/ la la ni rang byang chub la yang dag par bskul lo/ /la la ni byang chub la/ la la ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
323a7(nyi khri): la/ la la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par bskul lo/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
323b1(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa'i bde ba dang ldan par 'god de/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems
323b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
323b3(nyi khri): chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'jig rten
323b4(nyi khri): pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams bzod pa dang / bshad pa dang / ma nor bar bstan pa ste/ 'di ltar mi gtsang ba'i rnam pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshangs
323b5(nyi khri): pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang thun
323b6(nyi khri): mong du gyur pa rnams te/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sbyin pa de btang nas/ rnam
323b7(nyi khri): grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi chos ma nor bar blangs pa de la bskyod de/ de las bskyod nas thabs mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i chos rnams 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu
324a1(nyi khri): 'god do/ /de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang / 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs
324a2(nyi khri): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mo/ /'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
324a3(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid de/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o//
324a4(nyi khri): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ /tshul khrims
324a5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes
324a6(nyi khri): pa'o| |nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun shes pa'o/ /'phags pa'i
324a7(nyi khri): bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
324b1(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
324b2(nyi khri): shes pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes pa'o/ /byams
324b3(nyi khri): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po shes pa'o/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang
324b4(nyi khri): bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtogs par de
324b5(nyi khri): dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/ bag
324b6(nyi khri): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
324b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
325a1(nyi khri): thob par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni
325a2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
325a3(nyi khri): par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag tu ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye brag yod do/ /
325a4(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bye brag ci lta bu zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
325a5(nyi khri): 'gyur ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brnyes pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnas shing chos thams cad la mun pa med pa thob pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'i
325a6(nyi khri): sems kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
325a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ de la brten pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
325b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing / thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas/ rnam pa thams
325b2(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'god pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang
325b3(nyi khri): thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub
325b4(nyi khri): kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
325b5(nyi khri): dgu dang / zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / smon gnas shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / shin tu
325b6(nyi khri): yongs su dag pa bzhi dang / dbang bcu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / bsrung ba med pa gsum
325b7(nyi khri): dang / dgongs pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / bag chags kyi sgrib pa spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
326a1(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting
326a2(nyi khri): nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams te/ 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang gi lus dang /
326a3(nyi khri): phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam
326a4(nyi khri): par bsal cing / rnam par spyod do/ /lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la kun 'byung ba dang / zad pa'i
326a5(nyi khri): rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do/ /nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba dang /
326a6(nyi khri): nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems dang / nang gi chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan
326a7(nyi khri): pa| dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /
326b1(nyi khri): chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang
326b2(nyi khri): zhe na/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i
326b3(nyi khri): phyir mos pa bskyed cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang / bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa'o/ /rab
326b4(nyi khri): 'byor| rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / dpyod pa'i ting
326b5(nyi khri): nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang /
326b6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ stobs lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /
326b7(nyi khri): dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te/ de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag
327a1(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed ba yan dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
327a2(nyi khri): dang | dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang
327a3(nyi khri): dag byang chub kyi yang lag ste/ de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta
327a4(nyi khri): pa dang / yan dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa
327a5(nyi khri): dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o/ /'di la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
327a6(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa
327a7(nyi khri): ste| de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni mtshan
327b1(nyi khri): ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
327b2(nyi khri): ces bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhes na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'de ni rnam par thar pa dang po'i/ /nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi
327b3(nyi khri): gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /bzang bar mos pa di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa
327b4(nyi khri): 'di ni rnam par thar ba bzhi pa'o/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa
327b5(nyi khri): 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /'dus shes med 'du shes med min mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa
327b6(nyi khri): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di
327b7(nyi khri): la la la 'dod pas dben/ /sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam
328a1(nyi khri): gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa de nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig
328a2(nyi khri): tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las
328a3(nyi khri): 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par
328a4(nyi khri): spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing
328a5(nyi khri): yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa'i btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye
328a6(nyi khri): par bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes
328a7(nyi khri): yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha'
328b1(nyi khri): yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes
328b2(nyi khri): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye
328b3(nyi khri): mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
328b4(nyi khri): mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o/ /de la
328b5(nyi khri): mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ mtha' dag sa dang / mtha' dag chu dang / mtha' dag me dang / mtha' dag rlung dang / mtha' dag sngon po dang / mtha' dag ser po dang / mtha'
328b6(nyi khri): dag dmar po dang / mtha' dag dkar po dang / mtha' dag rnam par shes pa dang / mtha' dag nam mkha' ste/ de dag ni mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o/ /de la zil gyis
328b7(nyi khri): gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ nang gzugs su 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag
329a1(nyi khri): zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o/ /nang gzugs su 'du
329a2(nyi khri): shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong
329a3(nyi khri): zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha
329a4(nyi khri): dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o/ /
329a5(nyi khri): nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil
329a6(nyi khri): gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/ kha dog
329a7(nyi khri): sngon po/ sngon por snang ba/ mdog sngon po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me tog o ma ka lta bu'am/ yul wA ra NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba/ kha dog sngo ba sngo bar snang ba/ mdog
329b1(nyi khri): sngo bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du
329b2(nyi khri): shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser por snang ba/ mdog ser po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing kar shi ka ra'i me tog lta bu'am/ yul wA ra NA sir byas pa'i
329b3(nyi khri): gos ltar ser ba/ kha dag ser ba/ ser bar snang ba/ mdog ser bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa
329b4(nyi khri): 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar por snang ba/ mdog dmar po 'di lta ste/
329b5(nyi khri): dper na/ many+dzu dzi pa ka'i me tog lta bu'am/ yul wA ra NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar dmar ba/ kha dog dmar ba/ dmar bar snang ba/ mdog dmar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag
329b6(nyi khri): zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi
329b7(nyi khri): gzugs dkar po/ kha dog dkar po/ dkar por snang ba/ mdog dkar po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skar ma pa ba sangs kyi 'od lta bu'am/ yul wA ra NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar dkar
330a1(nyi khri): ba| kha dog dkar ba/ dkar bar snang ba/ mdog dkar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar
330a2(nyi khri): 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o/ /de la nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
330a3(nyi khri): rnam par spyod pa/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i mthu yod pa/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis 'grub pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /smon
330a4(nyi khri): nas kyi shes pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas te/ 'di shes par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi shes pa'am/ shes pa gang dang gang
330a5(nyi khri): 'dod par gyur pa de la yid kyis smon pa byed de/ de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ de'i smon lam de yongs su grub par gyur cing / shes bya de'ang shes pa de ni/ smon nas kyi
330a6(nyi khri): shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang /
330a7(nyi khri): pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go/
330b1(nyi khri): de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go /de la
330b2(nyi khri): dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang
330b3(nyi khri): ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag go/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di
330b4(nyi khri): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
330b5(nyi khri): mkhyen to/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / las yongs su blangs pa'i rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
330b6(nyi khri): du rab tu mkhyen to/ /khams sna tshogs can dang / khams du ma can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi mos
330b7(nyi khri): pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta
331a1(nyi khri): pa bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
331a2(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
331a3(nyi khri): du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya stong dang / tshe
331a4(nyi khri): rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du'ang rjes su dgongs so/ /bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ bskal pa brgya'i bar dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa
331a5(nyi khri): stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs te/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug
331a6(nyi khri): go/ ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/ /zas ni 'di za za'o/ /yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so/ /tshe'i
331a7(nyi khri): mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ bdag de nas shi 'phos nas/ che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa
331b1(nyi khri): dang bcas/ sa mal dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs so/ /lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ sems can 'chi 'pho
331b2(nyi khri): ba dang / skye ba dag kyang gzigs so/ /kha dog sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du nye
331b3(nyi khri): bar 'dod pa'i sems can rnams rab tu mkhyen te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan
331b4(nyi khri): pa| 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/ ngan seng log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni
331b5(nyi khri): lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag pa'i
331b6(nyi khri): lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o/ /zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to/ /zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir/ sems rnam
331b7(nyi khri): par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba dang / zag pa med pa'i yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs so/ /rab 'byor/
332a1(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ 'di la chos 'dis mngon
332a2(nyi khri): par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan
332a3(nyi khri): par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas/ bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med ba thob pa dang / mi
332a4(nyi khri): 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/
332a5(nyi khri): bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /bdag zag pa zad do zhes
332a6(nyi khri): dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan
332a7(nyi khri): su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba
332b1(nyi khri): thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod do/ /khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra bsgrag go /tshangs pa'i
332b2(nyi khri): 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar ma nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar
332b3(nyi khri): bya'o| |gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la brten na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i
332b4(nyi khri): tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag
332b5(nyi khri): la bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pas rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra bsgrag go/
332b6(nyi khri): tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis yang
332b7(nyi khri): dag par bskor bar bya'o/ /gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan
333a1(nyi khri): byas na/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs
333a2(nyi khri): gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag
333a3(nyi khri): bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pas rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra bsgrag go /
333a4(nyi khri): tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor par mi nus pa bdag
333a5(nyi khri): gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so
333a6(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ de dag kyang
333a7(nyi khri): gang zhe na/ don la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshigs la dmigs pa dang / spobs pa la dmigs pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs
333b1(nyi khri): pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyad pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga'
333b2(nyi khri): bas| la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi
333b3(nyi khri): spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs
333b4(nyi khri): pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa gnyis pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
333b5(nyi khri): la thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med
333b6(nyi khri): pa gsum pa'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe/ la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing
333b7(nyi khri): bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed na'ang / des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/ yid bde bar mi
334a1(nyi khri): 'gyur| thugs yeng por yang mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar bzhag pa dang po'o/ /la la rna ba btud te rim gror nyan cing bka' mnyan pa'i
334a2(nyi khri): sems nye par gzhog pa med pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed na'ang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar mi 'gyur/ mi bzod par mi 'gyur/
334a3(nyi khri): thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar bzhag pa gnyis pa'o/ /la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la/ chos dang
334a4(nyi khri): gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed/ la la rna ba btud de rim gror mi nyan cing / /bka' nyan ba'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi
334a5(nyi khri): byed kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa'am/ thugs khro ba gnyis su mi 'gyur te/ thams cad du dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod
334a6(nyi khri): pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum pa'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
334a7(nyi khri): don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi 'da' ba ste/ de ni nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs
334b1(nyi khri): pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang / lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu'ang
334b2(nyi khri): mi mnga' ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje
334b3(nyi khri): chen po gang dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir/ dus thams cad du 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa mdzad
334b4(nyi khri): ces bya ste/ dngos su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa rtag par 'byung ste/ de ni thugs rje chen
334b5(nyi khri): po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o/ /ca co mi mnga'o/ /dgongs pa nyams
334b6(nyi khri): pa mi mnga'o/ /'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o/ /thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o/ /ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o/ /mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /brtson 'grus
334b7(nyi khri): yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba yongs
335a1(nyi khri): su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes
335a2(nyi khri): kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes
335a3(nyi khri): su 'brang ngo / /'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /da ltar byung
335a4(nyi khri): ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad
335a5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dmigs pa med pa/ dran pas dbang sgyur ba/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces
335a6(nyi khri): bya'o|| ||shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po drug cu brgyad pa/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
335a7(nyi khri): gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang /
335b1(nyi khri): bdun shin tu mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang / ri dwags e Ne ya'i byin
335b2(nyi khri): pa lta bu dang / phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil
335b3(nyi khri): pa dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / seng+ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang / phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang / shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu
335b4(nyi khri): zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng+ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / tshems shin
335b5(nyi khri): tu mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang
335b6(nyi khri): zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/ rus pa'am ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang
335b7(nyi khri): 'dra ba mnga' bas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o/ /zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa med pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa'o/ /
336a1(nyi khri): ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel bas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba'o/ /shing bal gyi sgo nga ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon
336a2(nyi khri): pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o/ /phyag dang / zhabs dang / phrag pa dang / mgur gyi lhun shin tu mtho bas bdun shin tu mtho ba'o/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas
336a3(nyi khri): sor mo ring ba'o/ /rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o/ /sku lag pa mdun du 'phags la drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o/ /pus mo'i lha nga dang long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs
336a4(nyi khri): par mtho ba'o/ /spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o/ /ri dwags e Ne ya'i byin pa dang / smig ma dang / ldum bu dar ba ltar drang zhing ma nyams
336a5(nyi khri): la| rim gyis gzhol bar grub cing / byin pa zlum pas ri dwags e Ne ya'i byin pa lta bu'o/ /brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga la reg
336a6(nyi khri): pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o/ /glang po dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o/ /shin tu
336a7(nyi khri): sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog go/ /gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'dug la sku la rdul gyis mi
336b1(nyi khri): gos pas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o/ /shin tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re rer skyes shing gnyis su med pas/ spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa'o/ /me tog kund dang / zla ba dang / 'o ma
336b2(nyi khri): dang / ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la/ nyi ma dang / zla ba brgya las kyang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu brgyan pas zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'o/ /ro stong
336b3(nyi khri): che bas seng+ge'i ro stod do/ /mgur dang rgyud legs par 'brel cing / lhun zlum pas phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o/ /gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par
336b4(nyi khri): grub pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o/ /rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyis ma nyams shing / rnam par shes pa 'dra ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog go /sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam
336b5(nyi khri): pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa'o/ /spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pas dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu spyi gtsug
336b6(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'o/ /me tog ut+pa la dmar po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o/ /tshangs pa dang bya ka la ping+ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i
336b7(nyi khri): dbyangs so/ /'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te/ yid du 'ong bas seng+ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o/ /me tog kund dang / dung gi bcag 'phro ltar
337a1(nyi khri): shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas tshems shin tu dkar ba'o/ /tshems la mtho dman med pas tshems mnyam pa'o/ /tshems la mtshams ma dod pas
337a2(nyi khri): tshems thags bzang ba'o/ /bla 'og gye gu med pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o/ /dkar gnag gi cham 'dres la shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos ma yog
337a3(nyi khri): pas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o/ /rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzer bas ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o/ /de la bla ma la bsu bskyal dang / chos mnyan pa la bstod pa dang /
337a4(nyi khri): gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten la sogs pa la bsti stang du byas pas phyag dang / zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so/ /yi dam
337a5(nyi khri): la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ de ni mi g.yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltas so/ /sbyin pa dang / ngag snyan pa dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam bzhi
337a6(nyi khri): goms par byas pas/ phyag dang / zhabs dra bas 'brel pa ste/ de ni myur du 'du ba'i snga ltas so/ /bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas/
337a7(nyi khri): phyag dang / zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba ste/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba 'thob pa'i snga ltas so/ /
337b1(nyi khri): bcings pa bkrol ba dang / srog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pas sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba ste/ de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so/ /dge ba'i chos yang
337b2(nyi khri): dag par blangs pa dang / bzung ba mngon par spel cing 'grib par ma byas pas/ zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba ste/ de ni mi nyams pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas
337b3(nyi khri): so| |rig pa dang bzo'i gnas rim gror byas shing / gzhan byin pa dang / bdag gis blangs pas ri dwags e Ne ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/ de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so/ /bdog cing yod pa'i
337b4(nyi khri): nor la bslangs na mi 'gong bar gtong zhing / med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa ste/ de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang / dul ba'i snga ltas so/ /'grogs pa dang / mdza' bshes
337b5(nyi khri): dang / gnyen pa ma phye ba dang / bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs
337b6(nyi khri): su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so/ /stan dang / gos dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/ de
337b7(nyi khri): gnyis ni gdan dang / na bza' dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po 'thob pa'i snga ltas so/ /'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang /
338a1(nyi khri): phu nu la sogs pad+ma ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra par rim gro byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang / bcol ba rnal ma gzan pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su
338a2(nyi khri): 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/ de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so/ /mi snyan par mi zer zhing mi smod la/ snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin pas/
338a3(nyi khri): seng+ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so/ /na ba rnams la rtsi dang / rim gro dang / sman pa dang / nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa
338a4(nyi khri): dang / rim gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste/ de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so/ /skyed mos tshal dang / 'khor dang / btung ba dang / rdzing bu dang / rgal dka'
338a5(nyi khri): ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang / phreng ba'i gnas dang / stegs dang / gtsug lag khang bya ba la sogs pa gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing / bdag gis gzhan la byin pas/
338a6(nyi khri): shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/ /yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bar
338a7(nyi khri): smras pas/ ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/ /gsung yan lag lnga dang
338b1(nyi khri): ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing / rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang / gtang mi bra zhing rnar
338b2(nyi khri): snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o/ /yun ring po nas tshig kyal ba spangs shing / dus su smra smra bas seng+ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so/ /rim
338b3(nyi khri): gror bya ba dang / brnyas pa med pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas/ tshems shin tu dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de ni 'khor snga nas bsags ba'i snga ltas so/ /yun ring po nas bden
338b4(nyi khri): zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig smra smra bas/ tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so/ /pang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes
338b5(nyi khri): par bsam pa med la ma chags mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so/ /rab
338b6(nyi khri): 'byor| de dag ni da bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom
338b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra
339a1(nyi khri): bar sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon
339a2(nyi khri): por byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
339a3(nyi khri): shin tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa bar rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
339a4(nyi khri): 'das rnams ni thugs dang / gsung dang / sku'i phrin las dang / 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/ rtsa mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa
339a5(nyi khri): 'grol ba ste/ rtsa la mdud pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/ long bu mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
339a6(nyi khri): ni mi mnyam pa thams cad las sgrol ba ste/ zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng+ge ste/ seng+ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
339a7(nyi khri): rnams ni mi'i glang po ste/ glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa
339b1(nyi khri): yin| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i khyu mchog ste/ khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas phyogs
339b2(nyi khri): su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/ mi yo
339b3(nyi khri): par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/ sku shin tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams
339b4(nyi khri): shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/ sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang /
339b5(nyi khri): gsung dang / thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs
339b6(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu
339b7(nyi khri): rdzogs pa ste/ dpe byad shin tu rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste/ sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
340a1(nyi khri): rnams ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu 'jam pa'i
340a2(nyi khri): chos ston pa ste/ sku shin tu gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku zhum pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
340a3(nyi khri): rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/ sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ sku shin tu mkhregs pa
340a4(nyi khri): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag legs par ston pa ste/ yan lag dang / nying lag spa bar mdzes pa yin/
340a5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i
340a6(nyi khri): slob ma mnga' ba ste/ phyal zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor pa'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin tu 'phyang ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs
340a7(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi be'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad pa rnam par bzlog pa ste/ phyal phyam mer
340b1(nyi khri): 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste/ lte ba zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga'
340b2(nyi khri): ba ste/ lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
340b3(nyi khri): 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ kun tu spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba
340b4(nyi khri): mnga' ba ste/ sku la sme ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar rab tu yang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin/
340b5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang / skye bo phal la byams pas dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
340b6(nyi khri): shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/ sangs
340b7(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'cha' ba ste/ zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan
341a1(nyi khri): 'jig rten du bkye ba ste/ zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du btang zhing 'dul ba ste/ ljags
341a2(nyi khri): shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin tu srab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa'i
341a3(nyi khri): skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyi chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag par dka' ba ste/ ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang / 'brug
341a4(nyi khri): gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang / 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bar
341a5(nyi khri): smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems
341a6(nyi khri): mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos
341a7(nyi khri): dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ mche ba mnyam pa dang
341b1(nyi khri): ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshems mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes
341b2(nyi khri): rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin tu gtsang
341b3(nyi khri): ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin
341b4(nyi khri): tu rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste/ rdzi ma stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
341b5(nyi khri): rnams ni lha dang / lha ma yin dang / skyes bu dang / na chung mchog gi mig dkar nag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba ste/ spyan dkar
341b6(nyi khri): nag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/ smin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
341b7(nyi khri): rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan
342a1(nyi khri): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis/ sems can snum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin
342a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/ snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon
342a3(nyi khri): mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ snyan mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang
342a4(nyi khri): ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ zhal dpral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
342a5(nyi khri): 'das rnams ni pas kyi rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/ zhal dpral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shin
342a6(nyi khri): tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung ba rnam par bzlog pa ste/ dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
342a7(nyi khri): mthong ba dang bsgoms pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbu skra stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs
342b1(nyi khri): su chud pa ste/ dbu skra 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ dbu skra ma 'dzings pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
342b2(nyi khri): ni brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/ dbu skra mi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu
342b3(nyi khri): skra dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang / bkra shis dang dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
342b4(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang /
342b5(nyi khri): yang dag par bstan pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi
342b6(nyi khri): sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar
342b7(nyi khri): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin
343a1(nyi khri): pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
343a2(nyi khri): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems
343a3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus
343a4(nyi khri): pa med de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
343a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis
343a6(nyi khri): don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang
343a7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can
343b1(nyi khri): rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
343b2(nyi khri): 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i don mthun pas sems can
343b3(nyi khri): rnams sdud do/ /rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
343b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad 'doms shing 'di skad ston to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod tshur
343b5(nyi khri): gshegs/ yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig /yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig /yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis
343b6(nyi khri): shig / yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig /yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig /yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
343b7(nyi khri): kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig / yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig /yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus
344a1(nyi khri): par sgoms shig ces chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
344a2(nyi khri): kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la
344a3(nyi khri): mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa mkhas par bya ba la goms shing yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
344a4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge
344a5(nyi khri): mang pos yi ge med pa'i chos ston kyang / rab 'byor/ chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba'ang ma yin te/ rab 'byor/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo
344a6(nyi khri): mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos te/ gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
344a7(nyi khri): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yang shin tu mi dmigs/ chos
344b1(nyi khri): kyang mi dmigs/ chos kyi dngos po'ang mi dmigs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
344b2(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam
344b3(nyi khri): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi
344b4(nyi khri): la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
344b5(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
344b6(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la
344b7(nyi khri): gnas nas/ sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/ de la ni sems can mi dmigs te/ sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /sems can mi dmigs pas/ gzugs
345a1(nyi khri): dmigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can mi dmigs pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so/ /sems
345a2(nyi khri): can mi dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du dmigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can mi dmigs pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs
345a3(nyi khri): su ma mchis so/ /sems can mi dmigs pas/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dmigs su ma mchis so/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dmigs su ma mchis so/ /sems
345a4(nyi khri): can dmigs su ma mchis pa la ni sems can ma mchis so/ /gzugs ma mchis so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi
345a5(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du ma mchis so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma mchis so/ /mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ma mchis so/ /dpe byad bzang
345a6(nyi khri): po brgyad cu ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang
345a7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de
345b1(nyi khri): de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar sems can mi dmigs pas nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /phyi nang stong
345b2(nyi khri): pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rig par bya'o/ /phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /skye mched stong
345b3(nyi khri): pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /sems can stong pa nyid du rig
345b4(nyi khri): par bya'o/ /srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong pa
345b5(nyi khri): po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /yang dag par spong ba
345b6(nyi khri): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden
345b7(nyi khri): pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
346a1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
346a2(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir
346a3(nyi khri): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad
346a4(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig
346a5(nyi khri): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas/ phyin ci log
346a6(nyi khri): tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston te/ ji ltar stong pa nyid de dag la'ang mi 'jug pa de ltar ston to/ /des de ltar mthong nas chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes te/ chos
346a7(nyi khri): gang yang 'khrug par mi byed/ gnyis su mi byed do/ /yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du'ang ston par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni/
346b1(nyi khri): sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma sprul cing sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la la brtson
346b2(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bsam gtan bzhi dang / la la tshad med pa bzhi dang /
346b3(nyi khri): la la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sbyor/ la la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / la la rnam par thar pa
346b4(nyi khri): brgyad dang / la la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / la la stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor/ la
346b5(nyi khri): la ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor/ la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / la la so so yang dag par
346b6(nyi khri): rig pa bzhi dang / la la byams pa chen po dang / la la snying rje chen po dang / la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor/ la la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor/
346b7(nyi khri): la la lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / la la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / la la dgra bcom pa nyid dang / la la rang byang chub la sbyor/ la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
347a1(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar la sbyor na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma
347a2(nyi khri): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems
347a3(nyi khri): can rnams la chos ston te/ de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
347a4(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
347a5(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
347a6(nyi khri): pa ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad
347a7(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni shin tu
347b1(nyi khri): rnam par dag pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
347b2(nyi khri): spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston kyang sems can du mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa la/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
347b3(nyi khri): gyis gnas te/ gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad
347b4(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la ni gang yang gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
347b5(nyi khri): gang la gnas par bya ba da lta bu'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs te/ dngos po med pa la dngos po med pa mi gnas so/ /rang bzhin la rang bzhin mi gnas so/ /gzhan gyi dngos po la gzhan gyi
347b6(nyi khri): dngos po mi gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag thams cad dmigs su med de/ gang dmigs su med pa de ni gang la'ang mi gnas so/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub
347b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid thams cad kyis rab tu 'byed de/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol
348a1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
348a2(nyi khri): chen po rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi skyon du mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
348a3(nyi khri): de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang / nyan thos de dag gis kyang chos nyid de'i rjes su rtogs te/ chos nyid de'i rjes su
348a4(nyi khri): rtogs nas kyang sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de'ang chos rnams kyi chos nyid las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings ni 'da' ba med do/ /de bzhin nyid dang / yang
348a5(nyi khri): dag pa'i mtha' ni 'da' ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la gang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin med do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
348a6(nyi khri): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar chos kyi dbyings la'ang 'da' ba ma mchis/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la'ang 'da' ba ma mchis na ci
348a7(nyi khri): lags/ 'o na gzugs kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
348b1(nyi khri): 'du byad BYED dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen p
348b2(nyi khri): a nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab

348b6(nyi khri): ltar gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam

349a1(nyi khri): gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na/ 'o na ji ltar chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam
349a2(nyi khri): par dgod cing nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nag po ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten/ dkar po'i chos rnams kyi rnam
349a3(nyi khri): par smin pa dkar po ni lha dang mi/ dkar nag gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar nag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnams su myong ba/ mi gnag cing dkar ba'i chos rnams kyi
349a4(nyi khri): rnam par smin pa mi gnag cing dkar ba ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang /

349a6(nyi khri): kyi bden pa tshad mar byas te/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod par bstan gyi/ don dam pa'i bden pas ni 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bstan par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de ni

349b1(nyi khri): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ste/ 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar
349b2(nyi khri): kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lags kyi/ don dam pa'i bden par ma lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo de thams cad kyang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras

349b4(nyi khri): ro| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ci byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa'am/ don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/ gal te shes na ni de dag kyang /

349b6(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par dgod par 'gyur na/ rab 'byor/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la/ lam yang med/ lam rnam par dgod pa'ang med/ lam bsgom pa'ang med par
349b7(nyi khri): byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lta ga las 'ong / rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni lam yang yod/ lam bsgom pa'ang yod pas na/ de'i
350a1(nyi khri): phyir 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu

350a6(nyi khri): te de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum
350a7(nyi khri): spangs pas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems bsrabs pas/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /'og ma'i cha can gyis
350b1(nyi khri): kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bla ma'i cha can gyis kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /gang ci'ang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad
350b2(nyi khri): 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pas rang byang chub bo/ /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes gsungs na/
350b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ ris su bcad cing 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par bzhag pa ma mchis na/ gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/

350b6(nyi khri): bar gshegs pa/ de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'o na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la ris su bcad pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
350b7(nyi khri): de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos
351a1(nyi khri): rnams 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu chud par gyur na/ de'i tshe 'dus byas zhes sam/ 'dus ma byas zhes chos gang la'ang ris su gcod
351a2(nyi khri): pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang
351a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar bzung ste/ sems can rnams la ris su
351a4(nyi khri): bcad pas chos mi ston to/ /de bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
351a5(nyi khri): pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan dang po'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa'am/ bsam gtan gsum pa'am/
351a6(nyi khri): bsam gtan bzhi pa'am/ byams pa'am/ snying rje'am/ dga' ba'am/ btang snyoms sam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/ rnam shes mtha'
351a7(nyi khri): yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/
351b1(nyi khri): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
351b2(nyi khri): sam/ lam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar ba
351b3(nyi khri): rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge
351b4(nyi khri): 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen
351b5(nyi khri): po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ram/ chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /de mngon
351b6(nyi khri): par zhen pa med pas gang la'ang chags pa med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med/
351b7(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
352a1(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
352a2(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom yang
352a3(nyi khri): 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu rnams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad
352a4(nyi khri): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom mo/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang pha
352a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa drug dang / chos thams cad la spyod de/ chos gang la'ang gnas pa'am/ chags pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid
352a6(nyi khri): shin tu khong du chud do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po mngon par sgrub pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i le'u
352a7(nyi khri): ste drug cu gnyis pa'o/ / //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub
352b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sprul pa ni 'dod chags dang /
352b2(nyi khri): zhe sdang dang / gti mug la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod pa med de/ /phyi nang gi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /zag pa dang
352b3(nyi khri): bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med
352b4(nyi khri): do| |tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la yongs su spyod pa med
352b5(nyi khri): do| |pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bdan BDEN pa rnams dang / bsam g
352b6(nyi khri): tan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
352b7(nyi khri): dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs
353a1(nyi khri): su spyod pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
353a2(nyi khri): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang
353a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa med de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnams kyi mtshan
353a4(nyi khri): nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po drug cu dgu pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sprul pas lam
353a5(nyi khri): bsgom pa la brten kyang / kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur la/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na'ang mi gda' na lam bsgom du ci mchis/ bcom
353a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam
353a7(nyi khri): par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan
353b1(nyi khri): 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar
353b2(nyi khri): 'gyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi
353b3(nyi khri): tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
