353b4(nyi khri): pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
353b5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
353b6(nyi khri): shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sprul pa la ni gzugs ma mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis/
353b7(nyi khri): kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa gang las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ma mchis na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
354a1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i mthur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang
354a2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha'am/ mi dag las yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems
354a3(nyi khri): can gang yang dmigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub
354a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nas yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur
354a5(nyi khri): shes so/ /mthong ngo / /rtogs so/ /sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /mthong ngo / /rtogs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad
354a6(nyi khri): sgyu ma lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/ rtogs la/ sprul pa lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/ rtogs pa lags na/ gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu
354a7(nyi khri): phyin pa drug la spyod pa lags/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
354b1(nyi khri): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa lags/ de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam gyi bar
354b2(nyi khri): la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal
354b3(nyi khri): te sems can rnams rang rang gis/ chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs
354b4(nyi khri): med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod de/ rab 'byor/ sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur mi shes pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
354b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do/ /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/ /rab 'byor
354b6(nyi khri): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ mig yor lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan
354b7(nyi khri): 'das sems can rnams ci la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams gyen du skyod par bgyid/ bcom
355a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sems can rnams ni ming dang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa la gnas pas na/ byang
355a2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / de dag ming dang mtshan ma las gyen du skyod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ming ni gang
355a3(nyi khri): lags/ mtshan ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ ming zhes bya ba'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni glo bur gyi ming gis sgro btags
355a4(nyi khri): so| |'di lta ste/ ming zhes bya ba'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba'am/ gzugs zhes bya ba'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba'am/ 'du shes zhes bya ba'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba'am/ rnam par
355a5(nyi khri): shes pa zhes bya ba'am/ bud med ces bya ba'am/ skyes pa zhes bya ba'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba'am/ bu mo zhes bya ba'am/ sems can dmyal ba pa zhes bya ba'am/ byol song gi skye
355a6(nyi khri): gnas pa zhes bya ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/ lha zhes bya ba'am/ mi zhes bya ba'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba'am/
355a7(nyi khri): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba'am/
355b1(nyi khri): rang byang chub ces bya ba'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni sgyu ma'i ming gis sgro btags pa ste/ rab 'byor/ ming thams cad ni ming gi don gyis btags pa ste/ byis
355b2(nyi khri): pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i 'dus byas thams cad ni ming tsam ste/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
355b3(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ ming thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin gyi/ yongs su brtags pa dngos po med pa/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed chags par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad
355b4(nyi khri): stong pa la mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi byed do zhes skul ba byed de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
355b5(nyi khri): thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gnyis po 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i mtshan
355b6(nyi khri): ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
355b7(nyi khri): da ltar byung ba'i gzugs rags pa'am/ phra ba'am/ bzang ba'am/ /ngan pa'am/ rgyang ring ba'am/ thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun tu rtog pas bzung ba ste/
356a1(nyi khri): 'di ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i chos gang la'ang rung ste/ mtshan mar
356a2(nyi khri): bzung bas yongs su brtags shing nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o/ /de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
356a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhing / mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/ ci nas kyang 'di ni
356a4(nyi khri): mtshan ma'o/ /'di ni mtshan ma med pa'o zhes bya ba gnyis su mi ltung ba de ltar 'god cing gzhog ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
356a5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par bkrol zhing / mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do/ /gsol pa/
356a6(nyi khri): gal te chos 'di dag thams cad ni de tsam du bas te/ ming dang mtshan mar bas la btags pa tsam du bas te/ yongs su btags pa las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/
356a7(nyi khri): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob la/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi
356b1(nyi khri): khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
356b2(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal te dngos po'am dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
356b3(nyi khri): tshe| khyad par 'thob par yang mi 'gyur te/ gzhan yang khyad par 'thob pa la sbyor bar mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma'ang med/ dngos po'ang med pas na/ rab 'byor/ de'i
356b4(nyi khri): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
356b5(nyi khri): par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
356b6(nyi khri): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par
356b7(nyi khri): byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
357a1(nyi khri): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
357a2(nyi khri): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar
357a3(nyi khri): pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
357a4(nyi khri): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtshan
357a5(nyi khri): ma med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
357a6(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos
357a7(nyi khri): de dag la sbyor te/ rab 'byor/ gal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam gyis khyon cig mtshan ma yod na'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
357b1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang / zag
357b2(nyi khri): pa med pa'i chos rnams la gzhog par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa med pa yid la bya ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang
357b3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
357b4(nyi khri): 'das/ gal te de ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis shing / dran pa ma mchis te/ yid la bgyi ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/ /'di
357b5(nyi khri): dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni zag pa
357b6(nyi khri): med pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so/ /'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni nyan thos
357b7(nyi khri): kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
358a1(nyi khri): pa| rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags
358a2(nyi khri): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa'ang
358a3(nyi khri): gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta
358a4(nyi khri): ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i
358a5(nyi khri): 'bras bu'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /rang byang chub bo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i chos so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de de lags so/ /bde bar gshegs
358a6(nyi khri): pa| de de lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/ /rab 'byor/ chos
358a7(nyi khri): thams cad mtshan ma med pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
358b1(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga
358b2(nyi khri): dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi
358b3(nyi khri): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
358b4(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so
358b5(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa
358b6(nyi khri): dag gis rnam par 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs
358b7(nyi khri): par gzhan la bslab par bya ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni
359a1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/ /mtshan ma dang bral ba ni mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/ /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni smon pa med pa rnam par thar
359a2(nyi khri): pa'i sgo ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di dag la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/ skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ khams
359a3(nyi khri): bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po
359a4(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
359a5(nyi khri): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med
359a6(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
359a7(nyi khri): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
359b1(nyi khri): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rnam pa
359b2(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
359b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
359b4(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rab tu shes te/ gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gags pa dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin par rab
359b5(nyi khri): tu shes so/ /de la ji ltar na gzugs shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lbu ba'i phung po snying po med pa ltar shin tu gsong ldong dang / shin tu gse tshags dang / shin tu snying po
359b6(nyi khri): med par rab tu shes te/ de ltar na gzugs shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba
359b7(nyi khri): med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song ba der shes pa ste/ de ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa
360a1(nyi khri): yin no/ /ji ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/ mi 'gag /'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa
360a2(nyi khri): pa yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /de ltar na gzugs
360a3(nyi khri): kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba shes pa
360a4(nyi khri): yin no/ /ji ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro ba
360a5(nyi khri): ste| gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe
360a6(nyi khri): na| tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/ mi 'gag /'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/
360a7(nyi khri): phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na 'du shes shes
360b1(nyi khri): pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ smig rgyu la chu shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du
360b2(nyi khri): shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de
360b3(nyi khri): ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/ mi 'gag /'ong ba med/ 'gro
360b4(nyi khri): ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ de phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir
360b5(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu shing gi shun pa so sor phye na/ snying
360b6(nyi khri): po shin tu mi dmigs pa de ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med
360b7(nyi khri): cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba
361a1(nyi khri): dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag /'ong ba med/ 'gro ba
361a2(nyi khri): med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid
361a3(nyi khri): ces bya'o/ /de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs
361a4(nyi khri): yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni gang nas
361a5(nyi khri): kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ni rnam par
361a6(nyi khri): shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag pa/ 'ong
361a7(nyi khri): pa med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin du gnas pa
361b1(nyi khri): ste| de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos
361b2(nyi khri): rnams kyis stong / phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste/ de ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ mig
361b3(nyi khri): gi khams kyang mig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mig gi
361b4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /chos kyi khams
361b5(nyi khri): kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes te/ de ltar na
361b6(nyi khri): khams rnams shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med par shes pa dang / de bzhin du rten cing 'brel
361b7(nyi khri): bar 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med
362a1(nyi khri): pa dang / spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa de ltar na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes
362a2(nyi khri): pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ ji
362a3(nyi khri): ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa yin/ bden pa shes pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ gnyis las
362a4(nyi khri): rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ gnyis su med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no/ /de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog
362a5(nyi khri): par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin no/ /ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/
362a6(nyi khri): sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba zhes bya bar shes pa yin/ de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes pa yin/ de ltar na
362a7(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das /
362b1(nyi khri): gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag de ltar 'tshal na/ des chos kyi dbyings rnam par
362b2(nyi khri): dkrugs par mi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos la la zhig yod na ni/ rnam par dkrugs par yang
362b3(nyi khri): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so/ /gal te dmigs na ni chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i
362b4(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos
362b5(nyi khri): gang yang ma dmigs so/ /de ltar ma dmigs pas chos kyis dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no zhes bya bar brtags pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
362b6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
362b7(nyi khri): po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas gang la bslab par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
363a1(nyi khri): pos ni chos thams cad la bslab par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
363a2(nyi khri): 'das| ci'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang
363a3(nyi khri): rung ste/ dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings ni 'di lta ste/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang / 'jig
363a4(nyi khri): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas
363a5(nyi khri): dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos kyi dbyings la slob
363a6(nyi khri): pas chos thams cad la bslab par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
363a7(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ ji ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji
363b1(nyi khri): ltar skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
363b2(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nang stong pa
363b3(nyi khri): nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar yang dag par spong
363b4(nyi khri): ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
363b5(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
363b6(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
363b7(nyi khri): kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
364a1(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mi
364a2(nyi khri): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su grub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba
364a3(nyi khri): la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang / khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
364a4(nyi khri): kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan
364a5(nyi khri): dang | tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba
364a6(nyi khri): dang | dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes med pa'i sems can du skye
364a7(nyi khri): bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /
364b1(nyi khri): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar
364b2(nyi khri): sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / drug pa dang / bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / dgu pa dang /
364b3(nyi khri): sems bskyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa dang / sems can yongs
364b4(nyi khri): su smin par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub kyi lam la bslabs shing / chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du 'tshal
364b5(nyi khri): bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi lam la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs
364b6(nyi khri): la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab
364b7(nyi khri): par bgyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
365a1(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i
365a2(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
365a3(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong ba
365a4(nyi khri): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin
365a5(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
365a6(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ dgra
365a7(nyi khri): bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la bslab par bgyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du byang chub sems
365b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa'am/ mi spro ba spros par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba lags grang / bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings la ni rnam
365b2(nyi khri): par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/ gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos
365b3(nyi khri): kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings
365b4(nyi khri): ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang chos kyi
365b5(nyi khri): dbyings ma lags/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid
365b6(nyi khri): kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
365b7(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub
366a1(nyi khri): kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
366a2(nyi khri): par rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
366a3(nyi khri): shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzungs
366a4(nyi khri): kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang
366a5(nyi khri): dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
366a6(nyi khri): 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos
366a7(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang
366b1(nyi khri): byang chub kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang byang chub las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang
366b2(nyi khri): chub bo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam pa thams
366b3(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /
366b4(nyi khri): de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de de bzhin no/ /gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
366b5(nyi khri): par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
366b6(nyi khri): so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nyid kyang chos
366b7(nyi khri): kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
367a1(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
367a2(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
367a3(nyi khri): dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /
367a4(nyi khri): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
367a5(nyi khri): bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang
367a6(nyi khri): chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
367a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par yang mi 'gyur
367b1(nyi khri): te| chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad ni chos kyi
367b2(nyi khri): dbyings su shes nas/ chos thams cad ming med pa la ming gi brdas chos ston te/ 'di ni gzugs zhes bya'o/ /'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
367b3(nyi khri): shes pa zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
367b4(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i
367b5(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
367b6(nyi khri): pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
367b7(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par
368a1(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar zhes bya'o zhes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma byed pa'i mchan bu
368a2(nyi khri): mkhas pa zhig gis rdzas kyi rnam pa gyi na zhig la brten te/ gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sam/ ba lang gi gzugs sam/
368a3(nyi khri): rnga mo dang / lug gi gzugs sam/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs sam/ skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / dka' thub kyi nags
368a4(nyi khri): tshal dang / kun dga'i ra ba mdangs dga' ba'am/ rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba'am/ nags tshal mdangs dga' ba dag sprul cing / de dag tu stan dang / 'khor gyi stan dang /
368a5(nyi khri): gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / spyan gzigs zhim po dag bstan tam/ glu dang sil snyan gyis
368a6(nyi khri): skye bo dga' bar byas sam/ sbyin pa yongs su gtang pa'am/ tshul khrims bsrung ba'am/ bzod pa bsgrub pa'am/ brtson 'grus brtsam pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyis
368a7(nyi khri): rnam par rtse ba'am/ shes rab bsgom pa'am/ rnam pa de lta bu dag gis skye bo dga' bar byas te/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/ bram ze che zhing
368b1(nyi khri): mtho ba'i rigs dang / khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/ ri rab bstan tam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /
368b2(nyi khri): mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang
368b3(nyi khri): ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad
368b4(nyi khri): med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og
368b5(nyi khri): min gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad mad MED pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med m
368b6(nyi khri): in skye mched kyi lha gzugs med pa rnams bstan tam/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po
368b7(nyi khri): bstan tam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
369a1(nyi khri): dang | bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
369a2(nyi khri): la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la spyod pa
369a3(nyi khri): dang | sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bcu pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par
369a4(nyi khri): bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs
369a5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ba dang / spyad par dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
369a6(nyi khri): yongs su bsgrub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / snying rje chen
369a7(nyi khri): po mngon par bsgrub pa de dag bstan tam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa bstan na/ de la sems can byis pa'i ngang tshul can dag
369b1(nyi khri): 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma mi 'dis legs par bslabs pa ngo mtshar che'i re mdzes dag byed/ de ltar skye bo dga' bar byed cing / gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang
369b2(nyi khri): po'i gzugs dang / rta'i gzugs dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du ston pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes ngo mtshar cher 'dzin to/ /'di
369b3(nyi khri): lta ste/ skyes bu mkhas shing gsal la yid rno ba dang ldan pa/ dpyod pa dam pa dang ldan pa rnams ni 'di snyam ste/ 'di la chos gang yang dmigs su med na/ mi 'di de ltar med
369b4(nyi khri): pa'i chos kyis skye bo mang po 'di dag dga' bar byed pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so snyam ste/ sems can 'di dag ni dngos po med pa la dngos por 'du shes pa'o zhes bya bar
369b5(nyi khri): de dag gi shes pa 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs
369b6(nyi khri): pa'i chos gang yang mi mthong ste/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can du mi dmigs/ sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs te/
369b7(nyi khri): bdag kyang sbyin pa gtong ba yin/ gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa gtong ba de dag gi
370a1(nyi khri): legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang tshul khrims bsrung ba yin/ gzhan yang tshul khrims bsrung ba la yang dag
370a2(nyi khri): par bskul ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims bsrung ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa
370a3(nyi khri): yin| bdag kyang bzod pa bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ bzod pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bzod pa
370a4(nyi khri): bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom pa yin/ gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul
370a5(nyi khri): ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/
370a6(nyi khri): bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems
370a7(nyi khri): can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang shes rab bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang
370b1(nyi khri): shes rab la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ shes rab kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang shes rab bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa
370b2(nyi khri): yin/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bdun cu pa/ bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan yang
370b3(nyi khri): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag
370b4(nyi khri): par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang yan
370b5(nyi khri): lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang yan lag
370b6(nyi khri): brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa
370b7(nyi khri): yin/ gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ bslab pa'i gnas lnga'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bslab pa'i gnas lnga
371a1(nyi khri): yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa
371a2(nyi khri): yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ bsam gtan dang po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po
371a3(nyi khri): la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam
371a4(nyi khri): gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can
371a5(nyi khri): gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga'
371a6(nyi khri): ba dang / btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang btang snyoms la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ btang snyoms kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can
371a7(nyi khri): gzhan gang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /
371b1(nyi khri): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang 'du shes med
371b2(nyi khri): 'du shes med min skye mched la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang 'du shes med
371b3(nyi khri): 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
371b4(nyi khri): bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/
371b5(nyi khri): sems can gzhan gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i
371b6(nyi khri): sgo gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo
371b7(nyi khri): rnams bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang gzungs
372a1(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' par spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
372a2(nyi khri): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa
372a3(nyi khri): yin| gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems
372a4(nyi khri): can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu
372a5(nyi khri): rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bsgrub pa yin/ gzhan yang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par bskul ba
372a6(nyi khri): yin| mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
372a7(nyi khri): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bsgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ rab 'byor/ gal te chos kyi dbyings sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin
372b1(nyi khri): ma yin nam/ bar du'ang de bzhin du ma yin du zin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams
372b2(nyi khri): la chos kyi dbyings ston par mi 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi
372b3(nyi khri): dbyings de sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin/ bar du'ang de bzhin pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
372b4(nyi khri): mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston to/ /sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs
372b5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu gsum pa'o// //de nas
372b6(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar gal te sems can yang shin tu dmigs su ma mchis la/ sems
372b7(nyi khri): can du dmigs pa'ang ma mchis na/ su'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
373a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag pa'i
373a2(nyi khri): mtha' tshad mar byas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom ste/ rab 'byor/ gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan la/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan yin na ni/ byang chub
373a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ sems can gyi mtha' yang
373a4(nyi khri): gzhan ma yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
373a5(nyi khri): sgom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug pa med par sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god do/ /gsol pa/ bcom
373a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas
373a7(nyi khri): par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur na ni/ des rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom
373b1(nyi khri): ldan 'das/ rang bzhin la ni rang bzhin gnas pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
373b2(nyi khri): sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur ba'ang
373b3(nyi khri): med| rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur ba'ang med na/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas
373b4(nyi khri): sems can gyi mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag
373b5(nyi khri): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin te/ de ltar na sems can gyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
373b6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god kyang yang
373b7(nyi khri): dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par mi bgyid pa de lta bu'i thabs gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
374a1(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sems can rnams sbyin pa la rab tu 'god do/ /sbyin
374a2(nyi khri): pa la rab tu bkod nas/ sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' dang / tha ma'i mtha' dang / dbus ston te/ ji ltar sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' yang stong / tha ma'i mtha' yang stong / dbus kyang
374a3(nyi khri): stong pa de ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang stong / sbyin bdag kyang stong / len pa'ang stong par ston cing / rigs kyi bu/ de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la don de dag med kyi/ sbyin pa'ang gzhan
374a4(nyi khri): la| sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no snyam du ma sems shig/ sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la/ len pa'ang gzhan no snyam du ma sems shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod nam sbyin pa'ang
374a5(nyi khri): gzhan la/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no snyam du mi sems/ sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la/ len pa'ang gzhan no snyam du mi sems pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di bdud rtsi dang /
374a6(nyi khri): bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang / mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur te/ sbyin pa 'dis gzugs yongs su ma 'dzin cig/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su
374a7(nyi khri): ma 'dzin cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pas stong ngo / /de'i 'bras bu'ang 'bras bus stong ngo / /sbyin bdag kyang sbyin bdag gis stong ngo / /len pa'ang
374b1(nyi khri): len pas stong ste/ stong pa nyid la ni sbyin pa mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang / sbyin bdag dang / len pa mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis shin tu
374b2(nyi khri): stong ngo zhes brjod do/ /gzhan yang / rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams tshul
374b3(nyi khri): khrims la 'god de/ tshur rigs kyi bu/ srog gcod pa spongs la/ srog gcod pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun
374b4(nyi khri): du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa dang / tshig kyal pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / gang log par lta ba spongs la/ log par lta ba las phyir ldog par gyis
374b5(nyi khri): shig| rigs kyi bu/ chos 'di dag la ji ltar yongs su brtags pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin gang yang med kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ soms dang / gang gi srog gcad par bya ba'i srog chags
374b6(nyi khri): dang / gang srog gcad par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod
374b7(nyi khri): pa'i tshig dang / tshig kyal pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / gang log par lta ba dang / log par lta bar btags pa dang / gang gis log par lta bar btags
375a1(nyi khri): pa dang / gang gis log par mthong ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin zhes ston cing / tshul khrims la 'god de/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
375a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /des de la sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims
375a3(nyi khri): kyi 'bras bu bstan te/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de'ang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bstan pas/ rigs kyi bu des sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ngo bo nyid
375a4(nyi khri): kyis stong par rig nas/ de la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /mngon par zhen pa med pas 'khrug par mi 'gyur zhing shes rab bskyed do/ /shes rab des kyang bag la nyal ba dang /
375a5(nyi khri): kun nas ldang ba thams cad bcad nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/ de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi/ don dam par ma yin
375a6(nyi khri): no| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi dmigs te/ de'i mya ngan
375a7(nyi khri): las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
375b1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can phan tshun gnod par sems shing / 'khrug par gyur pa dang ldan pa dag mthong na/ 'di skad du 'dems shing ston te/ rigs kyi bu/ bzod pa sgrubs
375b2(nyi khri): shig/ bzod pa sgoms shig/ des pa dang / sems zhi ba dang / dang du sems pa'i ngang tshul can du gyis shig/ gang gnod par byed pa dang / gang gis gnod par bya ba dang /
375b3(nyi khri): gang la gnod par bya ba'i chos de dag ni/ thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin gyi/ rigs kyi bu/ gnod par byed pa ni su yod/ gnod par ni su la bya/ cis ni gnod par bya soms dang / chos de
375b4(nyi khri): dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nam yang mi stong par mi 'gyur to/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma mdzad do/ /byang chub sems
375b5(nyi khri): dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas so/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto
375b6(nyi khri): 'phyo chen po rnams kyis ma byas so/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul
375b7(nyi khri): dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / dge rgyas dang / gnas gtsang ma dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye
376a1(nyi khri): mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas te/ de ni rtag par yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o/ /rang bzhin gyis stong pa
376a2(nyi khri): ni su la'ang gnod par mi byed do zhes nas/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams thabs mkhas
376a3(nyi khri): pas/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu la sbyor te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bkod cing / rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag
376a4(nyi khri): par ston to/ /yang dag par bskul lo/ /yang dag par gzengs bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /gzhog go/ 'dul lo/ /rab tu 'god do/ /de'ang 'jig
376a5(nyi khri): rten gyi tha snyad kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gang thob par byed pa dang / gang gis thob par bya ba dang / gang thob par bya ba gang yang
376a6(nyi khri): med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don du gang shes rab kyi pha
376a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ de la sems can du dmigs pa med de/ sems can du gdags pa dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni sems can
376b1(nyi khri): gyis dben pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can le lo can brtson
376b2(nyi khri): 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/ 'di ltar lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul te/ rigs kyi bu dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni chos gang yang zhum zhing le lor
376b3(nyi khri): 'gyur ba'am/ gang la zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med do/ chos de dag ni thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid las mi 'da' ba yin gyi/ lus dang sems kyis brtson
376b4(nyi khri): 'grus bskyed la/ le lo bor te dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ nang stong pa nyid dam/
376b5(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ram/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong pa rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/
376b6(nyi khri): stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa
376b7(nyi khri): rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dang /
377a1(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin
377a2(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
377a3(nyi khri): pa dag la brtson par gyis shig / rigs kyi bu dag /stong pa nyid kyis chos de dag thams cad sgrib pa med par rtogs shig /sgrib pa med pa'i chos la zhum par 'gyur ba gang
377a4(nyi khri): yang med do zhes/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la
377a5(nyi khri): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par bskul lo/ /yang dag par gzengs bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /gzhog go /'dul lo/ /rab
377a6(nyi khri): tu 'god do/ /ci nas kyang gnyis la mi gnas pa de ltar rab tu 'god do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni gnyis su med de/ gnyis su byar med do/ /gnyis su
377a7(nyi khri): med pa'i chos ni gang la'ang gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas
377b1(nyi khri): pas sems can rnams la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi brtson 'grus la 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu/ sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus
377b2(nyi khri): sam| bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ram/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba
377b3(nyi khri): rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/
377b4(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/
377b5(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/
377b6(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje
377b7(nyi khri): chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag la brtson 'grus rtsoms la/ chos de dag gnyis par yang yid la ma byed cig /mi gnyis par yang yid la ma byed cig /de ci'i phyir
378a1(nyi khri): zhe na| chos de dag ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni gnyis par yid la bya ba ma yin/ mi gnyis par yang yid la bya ba ma yin
378a2(nyi khri): no| |rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sems can rnams rang bzhin
378a3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid la yongs su smin par byed de/ yongs su smin par byas nas/ rim gyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
378a4(nyi khri): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la 'god do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god do/ /rab 'byor/
378a5(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can sems g.yeng ba rnams la 'di skad du
378a6(nyi khri): 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu/ ting nge 'dzin sgoms shig /g.yeng ba'i 'du shes sam/ ting nge 'dzin gyi 'du shes sum byed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de
378a7(nyi khri): dag ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste| rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni gang g.yeng ba'am/ rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang dmigs su med do/ /khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin de la
378b1(nyi khri): gnas te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad na/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis dge ba'i chos gang ci byed kyang rung ste/ sbyin pa gtong ngam/ tshul khrims srung ngam/ bzod pa sgrub bam/
378b2(nyi khri): brtson 'grus rtsom mam/ ting nge 'dzin bskyed dam| shes rab sgom mam/ nang stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod dam/ dran pa nye bar bzhag
378b3(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam
378b4(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad pa la spyod dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam
378b5(nyi khri): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge
378b6(nyi khri): 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po
378b7(nyi khri): dang | snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod dam/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la spyod dam/
379a1(nyi khri): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod dam/ nyan thos kyi lam dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la spyod dam/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi
379a2(nyi khri): lam la spyod dam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la spyod dam/
379a3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod dam/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la spyod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la spyod kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i chos de dag
379a4(nyi khri): las gron chung dus 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
379a5(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas/ bar 'ga' yang las mi byed par mi 'gyur gyi/ dge ba thams cad
379a6(nyi khri): 'tshol zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsnyen bkur byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
379a7(nyi khri): du 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos pa de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs brjes
379b1(nyi khri): kyang nam du'ang rnam par chud mi za ste/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par gzungs thob cing lus kyi dbang po'am/ ngag gi dbang po'am/ yid kyi dbang po mi nyams pa yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
379b2(nyi khri): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bsgoms pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bsgoms pa
379b3(nyi khri): de lam thams cad shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur te/ nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam shin tu bsgoms par
379b4(nyi khri): 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rnam par chud mi za ba'i tshul gyis phan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur te/ rnam
379b5(nyi khri): par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed na/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'khor yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las
379b6(nyi khri): kyang yongs su mi nyams so/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing /
379b7(nyi khri): thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin
380a1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid la gnas shing / sems can shes rab 'chal pa can blo chung pa rnams mthong na/ 'di skad 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ tshur rigs
380a2(nyi khri): kyi bu| lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las gang ci byed kyang rung ste/ de thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rtogs shig dang / khyod kyi las thams cad bdud rtsi'i 'bras
380a3(nyi khri): bur 'gyur te/ mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni gang 'jig par 'gyur ba'am/ yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs su med
380a4(nyi khri): do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa'i chos kyang gang yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
380a5(nyi khri): 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni dngos po yod pa'ang ma yin/ dngos po med pa'ang ma yin/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ci zhig yongs su nyams par
380a6(nyi khri): 'gyur zhes/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la 'dems
380a7(nyi khri): shing rjes su ston to/ /de ltar 'dems shing rjes su ston pa'i tshe/ nam yang rjes su ma bsgrubs pa ma yin/ de ni bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing
380b1(nyi khri): gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang bslab pa'i
380b2(nyi khri): gnas lnga la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang yan lag brgyad
380b3(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas par yang dag par bskul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag
380b4(nyi khri): par bskul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan
380b5(nyi khri): bzhi pa la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par byams pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par byams pa bsgom pa la yang dag par bskul
380b6(nyi khri): ba yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par btang snyoms bsgom pa la yang dag par bskul
380b7(nyi khri): pa yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa
381a1(nyi khri): dang | 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par
381a2(nyi khri): 'jug pa la yang dag par bskul pa yin/ bdag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la bsgom pa yin/ gzhan
381a3(nyi khri): yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la yang dag par bskul pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la
381a4(nyi khri): yang dag par bskul ba yin/ bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
381a5(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
381a6(nyi khri): bcu la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
381a7(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par
381b1(nyi khri): bskul ba yin/ bdag kyang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang
381b2(nyi khri): po brgyad cu la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ bdag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa bskyed cing / de la mi gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god pa
381b3(nyi khri): yin| bdag kyang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa bskyed cing de la mi gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang dgra
381b4(nyi khri): bcom pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa yin/ bdag kyang rang byang chub kyi lam bskyed cing de la mi gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rang byang chub la rab tu 'god pa yin/ bdag kyang bla na
381b5(nyi khri): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam bskyed pa yin/ gzhan yang lam de la 'dems shing rjes su ston pa dang / gzhog cing 'dul ba dang 'god pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar
381b6(nyi khri): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing /
381b7(nyi khri): sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i tshe/ /nam yang las med par gnas pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ rang
382a1(nyi khri): bzhin stong pa nyid la ni sems can yang mi dmigs/ chos kyang mi dmigs/ chos ma lags pa de'ang mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar byang chub sems
382a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du yang dag par 'jug pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de
382a3(nyi khri): bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no/ /chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni sems can mi dmigs so/ /chos mi dmigs so/ /chos
382a4(nyi khri): ma yin pa mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
382a5(nyi khri): gnas par mi 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang chos rnams rang bzhin gyis stong par mi ston to/ /rang bzhin
382a6(nyi khri): gyis stong pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis
382a7(nyi khri): stong ngo / /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
382b1(nyi khri): kyi chos rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
382b2(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting
382b3(nyi khri): nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
382b4(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /mi chen po'i mtshan sum
382b5(nyi khri): cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
382b6(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
382b7(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/ /skye mched bcu gnyis ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos
383a1(nyi khri): ston to/ /khams bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar
383a2(nyi khri): chos ston to/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/ /stong pa nyid thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/ /
383a3(nyi khri): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
383a4(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi
383a5(nyi khri): dang | gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
383a6(nyi khri): dang | mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar
383a7(nyi khri): chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga'
383b1(nyi khri): ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to/ /mi
