518b1(nyi khri): la bris pa lta bu lnga brgya dang ldan pa/ bzhon pa lhan cig tu gshi bas GSHIBS? te 'gro ba'i zam pa dang bcas pa de lta bu mthong ngo / /lam gyi mdo'i dbus na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems d
518b2(nyi khri): pa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa chos kyi stan gyi steng na/ 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas chos 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /des mthong ma thag
518b3(nyi khri): tu 'di lta bu'i bde ba thob pa ni/ dper na/ bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par bzhag pa'i dge slong sems rtse gcig tu bzhag pa de lta bu'i bde ba thob par gyur to/ /mthong nas kyang
518b4(nyi khri): 'di snyam du bdag shing rta la zhon bzhin du 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i drung du 'gro ba ni mi rigs so snyam du bsams nas/ de
518b5(nyi khri): shing rta las babs so/ /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang shing rta de dag las babs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab
518b6(nyi khri): tu du ba de tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor/ mdun du byas nas dpag tu med pa'i rgyan rnams thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
518b7(nyi khri): chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang pa brtsegs
519a1(nyi khri): ma rin po che sna bdun las byas pa zhig byas te/ tsan+dan dmar pos brgyan pa/ mu tig gi dra ba bres pa/ brtsegs khang gi gra bzhir me mar gyis
519a2(nyi khri): snang ba bya ba'i phyir/ nor bu rin po che 'od gsal ba rnams bkod do/ /dngul gyi pog por bzhi'ang bar snang las 'phyang du bcug ste/ de na a ka ru nag po gtsang ma'i bdug pa rnams
519a3(nyi khri): 'thul ba ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa'i phyir ro/ /brtsegs khang de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khri bzhag ste/ de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom
519a4(nyi khri): bzhi bzhag go / de'i nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya mthing ga zhun mas bris pa bzhugs so/ /brtsegs khang de'ang me tog dang / dar sna
519a5(nyi khri): tshogs kyi phreng ba rnams kyis dbyangs pas rab tu brgyan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu dub de/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo
519a6(nyi khri): lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang pa brtsegs ma de dpag tu med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong ngo / /lha stong phrag du ma rnams kyang mthong / lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog
519a7(nyi khri): mnad ra ba dang / lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang / lha'i dngul gyi phye mas khang pa brtsegs ma de dag la kun tu 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ rab tu mngon par
519b1(nyi khri): 'thor ba dang / lha'i sil snyan dag sgrog pa thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad smras so/ /lha'i dbang
519b2(nyi khri): po khyod ci'i phyir lha stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs ma 'di la me tog mnad ra ba dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma la sogs pas 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ lha'i
519b3(nyi khri): sil snyan 'di dag kyang bar snang las lha rnams ci'i phyir sgrogs/ de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par
519b4(nyi khri): rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod mi shes sam/ 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces pa'i
519b5(nyi khri): yum/ skyed par mdzad pa/ bskrun pa gtso mo yin te/ gang la bslabs na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
519b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab
519b7(nyi khri): tu du bas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad smras so/ /kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces pa'i yum/
520a1(nyi khri): skyed par mdzad pa/ bskrun pa gtso mo de gang na bzhugs/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'o na lha khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang na/ gser gyi glegs bu
520a2(nyi khri): la bai DUR+Ya mthing ga zhun mas bris pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas/ rgya bdun gyis btab ste bzhag pas/ de bdag cag gis khyed
520a3(nyi khri): la bstan du mi rung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu tshogs pas/
520a4(nyi khri): me tog dang / phreng ba dang / gos dang / rin po che dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
520a5(nyi khri): dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog bdag cag gis khyer te 'ongs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas te/ de dag las kha cig ni byang chub sems
520a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa'i phyir bzhag go / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/ me tog
520a7(nyi khri): dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
520b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba der song ngo / /song nas kyang byang chub
520b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang /
520b3(nyi khri): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir kun tu gtor/ mngon par gtor/ rab tu mngon
520b4(nyi khri): par gtor to/ /de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i steng du me tog gi brtsegs khang du gnas par gyur to/ /gser
520b5(nyi khri): dang / dngul gyi me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa de dag kyang nam mkha' la gzhal yas khang du gnas par gyur to/ /chos gos dang / gos rin po che de dag kyang bar snang la
520b6(nyi khri): rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga
520b7(nyi khri): brgya po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mchod pa byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / cho
521a1(nyi khri): 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas 'di snyam du gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'di de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba
521a2(nyi khri): dang / de ltar mthu che ba dang / de ltar gzi brjid che ba ngo mtshar che'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang / de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dag rnam par sprul na/
521a3(nyi khri): nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur na/ lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de
521a4(nyi khri): dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la dga' ba dang / gus pa skyes nas de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
521a5(nyi khri): tu sems bskyed nas/ bdag cag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig /bdag cag byang
521a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang chos gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas thob pa'i chos de dag nyid thob par gyur cig / 'phags pa byang
521a7(nyi khri): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed pa de ltar bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par gyur
521b1(nyi khri): cig / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'di ji ltar 'gro ba mang po la rab tu ston pa de ltar bdag cag kyang 'gro ba mang po la rab tu ston par gyur cig /'phags pa byang chub sems
521b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag kyang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing /
521b3(nyi khri): yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces de lta bu'i smon lam dag kyang btab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la
521b4(nyi khri): sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la'ang bkur sti byas nas/
521b5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/ zhe sa dang bcas/ rim gro dang bcas/ thal mo sbyar nas phyogs
521b6(nyi khri): gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags
521b7(nyi khri): pa la 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'tshol ba na/ dgon pa zhig nas sgra thos pa/ rigs kyi bu/ shar phyogs su song zhig dang / de nas shes rab
522a1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/ /de nas bdag gis sgra de thos pa dang / shar phyogs gang na ba de logs su song song ba las/ bdag
522a2(nyi khri): 'di snyam du bdag gis sgra de la bdag ji srid cig tu 'gro dgos pa dang / su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos shing thob par 'gyur ba ma dris so snyam du bsams so/ /de ltar
522a3(nyi khri): bdag yid mi dga' ba dang / mya ngan chen por gyur cing / sa phyogs de nyid na nyin zhag bdun lon te/ bdag ji srid cig tu 'gro dgos/ su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan du
522a4(nyi khri): yod ces sgra de la ma dris so snyam pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa'i mya ngan las gzhan pa kha zas bza' ba'i sems kyang ma skyes so/ /de nas bdag gi mdun
522a5(nyi khri): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas/ des bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na/ spos can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer zhig yod de/ der
522a6(nyi khri): song zhig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad cing 'dug pa de khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
522a7(nyi khri): bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus bka' stsal pa bzhin du shar phyogs gang na bde logs su song song ba las/ rgyang gis 'phags pas chos 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong
522b1(nyi khri): ma thag tu'ang dper na/ bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par bzhag pa'i dge slong gi bde ba de lta bu thob par gyur to/ /bdag dga' zhing bde ba des khyab par gyur nas/ sa phyogs de
522b2(nyi khri): nyid nas ma g.yos par khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad cing 'dug pa thos so/ /de thos nas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya phrag du ma skyes par gyur to/ /bdag de na 'dug pa'i tshe
522b3(nyi khri): yang phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag la dbugs 'byin pa mdzad cing / rigs kyi bu/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba
522b4(nyi khri): yin pas legs so/ /legs so/ /nged kyis kyang de dag la gnas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
522b5(nyi khri): bdag la shin tu legs par bstan nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de
522b6(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gar gshegs snyam mo/ /de nas yang bdag 'di snyam du gyur te/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags
522b7(nyi khri): pa de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa la bslabs pa yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
523a1(nyi khri): gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa de bdag la ston to snyam mo/ /de bas na/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs
523a2(nyi khri): pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag 'dri'i/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ga las byon pa dang / gar bzhud pa ci
523a3(nyi khri): nas kyang bdag cag gis shes par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bur bdag la ston cig /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga
523a4(nyi khri): pa las/ rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i le'u ste/ bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
523a5(nyi khri): kyis 'phags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang nas kyang
523a6(nyi khri): ma byon/ gang du'ang ma bzhud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni mi g.yo ba'o/ /de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ skye ba med pa
523a7(nyi khri): ni 'gro ba'am 'ong ba med de/ skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ yang dag pa'i
523b1(nyi khri): mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ stong pa nyid la ni 'gro ba'am 'ong ba med de/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs
523b2(nyi khri): kyi bu/ ji lta ba nyid la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ ji lta ba nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba
523b3(nyi khri): med de/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'gog pa la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
523b4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ nam mkha'i dbyings la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ nam mkha'i dbyings gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos
523b5(nyi khri): 'di rnams las gzhan pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos 'di rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
523b6(nyi khri): pa de dag ni de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin nyid la ni rnam pa gnyis su med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin nyid ni gcig ste/ gnyis ma yin/ gsum ma yin
523b7(nyi khri): te| rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni med pa'i phyir bgrang ba las 'das pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig dpyid zla tha chung gi nyi ma'i gung la dpyid kyi nyi
524a1(nyi khri): ma tsha bas gdungs pa na/ smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong ba dang / de de dang de dag tu rgyug cing 'dir khrus bya'o/ /'dir chu btung ngo snyam du sems na/ rigs
524a2(nyi khri): kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ chu de gang nas 'ong / shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'am/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi rgya mtshor 'gro'am/ gang du 'gro /rtag
524a3(nyi khri): par rab tu ngu bas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ smig rgyu ba la chu yod pa ma yin na/ de la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba lta ga la yod/ rigs kyi bu/ dpyid kyi tsha bas gdungs pa'i mi de ni smig rgyu ba chu
524a4(nyi khri): med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pas byis pa'i rigs/ shes rab rtul po'i rigs te/ de na chu'i ngo bo ni yod pa ma yin no/ /chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu /de
524a5(nyi khri): de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du gang su'ang rung ba 'ga' zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam/ sgrar mngon par zhen nas/ de dag de bzhin
524a6(nyi khri): gshegs pa byon pa dang / bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa'i rigs/ shes rab rtul po'i rigs so zhes brjod par bya ste/ dper na/ mi zhig chu med pa la chur 'du
524a7(nyi khri): shes bskyed pa bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin pas gzugs kyi skur mi blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos nyid la ni 'gro pa'am 'ong ba med de/
524b1(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang byon pa'am bzhud pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs
524b2(nyi khri): sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ rkang thang gi tshogs la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang byon pa'am bzhud pa med do/ /rigs
524b3(nyi khri): kyi bu/ dper na/ mi zhig gi rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ bcu'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum cu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga
524b4(nyi khri): bcu'am/ brgya'am/ stong ngam/ brgya phrag stong ngam/ de bas kyang mang ba mthong nas sad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/
524b5(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud/ rtag par rab tu ngu bas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rmi lam gyi chos ni gang yang yongs su grub
524b6(nyi khri): pa med de/ rmi lam ni brdzun pa ste yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/ /chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du chos thams cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o zhes de bzhin
524b7(nyi khri): gshegs pas gsungs te/ rigs kyi bu gang su'ang rung / chos thams cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa legs par mi shes pa de dag ni de
525a1(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa la ming gi tshogs sam/ gzugs kyi tshogs su mngon par zhen pas/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud
525a2(nyi khri): par rtog ste/ 'di ltar chos nyid rab tu mi shes pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa'am/ bzhud par 'dod pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa so so'i skye bo
525a3(nyi khri): ste| de dag thams cad ni 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar dong / 'dong / 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thag ring / de dag thams
525a4(nyi khri): cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang thag ring ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes bshad pa legs par shes pa de dag
525a5(nyi khri): ni| chos gang yang 'ong ba'am 'gro bar mi rtog go / gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid 'di lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye
525a6(nyi khri): bar gyur to/ /de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i slob ma ste/ grong khyer gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za'o/ /de dag 'jig rten
525a7(nyi khri): pa'i sbyin gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che rnams ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs
525b1(nyi khri): dang / mtshams rnams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus rgya mtsho chen por rin po che rnams
525b2(nyi khri): 'byung ste/ de dag rgyu med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang rkyen rnams la rag lus pa/ rten cing 'brel pa las 'byung ngo / /rin po che de dag med par 'gyur ba na'ang phyogs bcu gang
525b3(nyi khri): du'ang mi 'pho ste dong pa med mod kyi/ 'on kyang rkyen gang rnams yod pa las/ rin po che de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rkyen rnams med par gyur pa las rin po che de rnams med par 'gyur
525b4(nyi khri): ro| |rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du'ang mi bzhud do/ /sangs rgyas bcom
525b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyi sku de dag rgyu med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin gyi/ sngon gyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa la rag lus pa/ rgyu las kun tu byung ba/ sngon gyi las kyi
525b6(nyi khri): rnam par smin pa'i sems can gyi dmigs pa dang ldan pa las snang ste/ phyogs bcu gang na'ang yod pa ni ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang rkyen gang rnams yod pa las sku yongs su rdzogs par
525b7(nyi khri): 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang rkyen de rnams med pa dang yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pi wang gi sgra 'byung ba'i tshe/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gag
526a1(nyi khri): pa'i tshe gang du'ang mi 'gro / gang du'ang 'pho ba med la/ rten cing yang 'byung pa rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ pi wang gi
526a2(nyi khri): khog pa dang / pags pa dang / yu ba dang / rgyud dang / blang ba dang / sbreng shing dang / mi'i rtsol pa la brten nas pi wang gi sgra 'byung ste/ sgra de'ang khog pa las kyang ma byung /
526a3(nyi khri): pags pa dang / yu ba dang / rgyud rnams dang / sbreng shing las kyang ma byung / blang ba dang / mi'i rtsol ba las kyang ma byung mod kyi/ 'on kyang thams cad 'dus shing ldan pa
526a4(nyi khri): las sgra 'byung ngo / /'gag pa na'ang sgra de gang du'ang mi 'gro /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa'ang / rgyu dang rkyen la rag
526a5(nyi khri): lus pa ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma las yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /rgyu gcig las ma byung / rkyen gcig las ma byung / dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig las sangs rgyas kyi sku byung ba ma yin no/ /
526a6(nyi khri): rgyu med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin te/ rgyu dang rkyen du ma tshogs pa las byung ba de gang nas kyang ma byon/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med na'ang gang du'ang mi bzhud do/ /rigs kyi
526a7(nyi khri): bu| de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa blta bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang de bzhin du rig
526b1(nyi khri): par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par rab tu shes na/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
526b2(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa la'ang nges par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa
526b3(nyi khri): med pa ston pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sa chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu
526b4(nyi khri): g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang 'khrugs/ nyams par gyur to/ /stong
526b5(nyi khri): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rtsi shing dang / sman dang / nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
526b6(nyi khri): kyis 'phags pa gang na ba de logs su rab tu 'dud par gyur to/ /dus ma yin pa'i me tog rnams kyang byung bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bab
526b7(nyi khri): par gyur/ rnga'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang steng gi bar snang las grag par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
527a1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la lha'i me tog mnad ra ba dang / lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog dang / phye ma gzhan dag gis kyang
527a2(nyi khri): gtor/ mngon par gtor/ rab tu mngon par gtor nas/ tshig 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yon tan gyis deng bdag cag rnams kyis kyang / don dam pa
527a3(nyi khri): las byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba/ 'jig tshogs la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma yin pa bshad pa thos
527a4(nyi khri): so| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la 'di skad smras so/ /
527a5(nyi khri): sa chen po 'di g.yos par gyur pa'i rgyu gang yin/ rkyen gang yin/ chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa med pa dang /
527a6(nyi khri): bzhud pa med pa bshad pa 'di khyod kyis dris/ ngas bshad pa na/ srog chags brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur/ srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad
527a7(nyi khri): cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ srog chags stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi ni rngul med cing dri ma med par gyur nas/ chos la chos kyi
527b1(nyi khri): mig rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/
527b2(nyi khri): bdag gis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang bzhud pa med pa'i chos bshad pa 'di yongs su dris pa las/ sems can 'di
527b3(nyi khri): snyed cig gi don byas pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni de nyid kyis
527b4(nyi khri): chog go / de phyin chad ni bdag la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu the tshom mi 'byung / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
527b5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba la dogs pa med do snyam nas de dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba de nyid dang ldan pas/ shing ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'phags
527b6(nyi khri): nas/ shing ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la gnas te/ 'di snyam du bdag 'di ltar bar snang la 'dug pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags
527b7(nyi khri): pa la cis mchod snyam du bsams pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba nam mkha' la 'phags pa
528a1(nyi khri): mthong nas de sems la yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes te/ lha'i me tog mnad ra ba dag de la byin nas 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod me
528a2(nyi khri): tog 'di dag gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa byos shig / rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng sems can stong
528a3(nyi khri): phrag mang po rnams kyi don byas par gyur pa'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu khyod la nged kyis phan gdags so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar spro bar byas pa de lta bur/ gang sems
528a4(nyi khri): can thams cad kyi don du bskal pa tshad med grangs med par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de lta bu dag rab tu dkon no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
528a5(nyi khri): lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog mnad ra ba dag blangs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ byang chub
528a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la bdag gi lus kyis kyang bkab nas tshig 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod la deng phan chad g.yog bya ba'i
528a7(nyi khri): phyir bdag gi lus kyang 'bul lo zhes nas/ de bar snang las babs te bdag phul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar
528b1(nyi khri): te 'dug go / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang / bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/
528b2(nyi khri): khyod la bdag cag kyang 'di ltar lus 'bul lo/ /bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag nyid thob par gyur cig /phyin chad kyang khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas dang
528b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byed par gyur cig / khyod dang lhan cig tu gnas par gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab
528b4(nyi khri): tu ngu bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang bu mo lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad smras so/ /bu mo khyod snying nas nga'i bsam pa dang mthun par byed cing / snying nas nga la lus 'bul na ni
528b5(nyi khri): nga'ang khyed len to/ /bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag khyod la snying nas bsam pa dang mthun par byed cing / khyod ci dgos pa bya ba'i phyir snying nas lus 'bul lo/ /de nas
528b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo de la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya rnams rgyan thams cad kyis klubs/ shing rta lnga brgya
528b7(nyi khri): po de rnams kyang rgyan gyis brgyan nas/ thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la phul te/ rigs kyi bu khyod la bu mo 'di rnams
529a1(nyi khri): dang / shing rta lnga brgya po 'di rnams yongs su spyad par bya ba'i phyir dbul lo zhes smras so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu
529a2(nyi khri): de la rigs kyi bu legs so/ /legs so/ /zhes nas/ legs pa byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de ltar bdog pa thams cad
529a3(nyi khri): yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /gtong ba'i sems de lta bu dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
529a4(nyi khri): chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /chos smra ba la de ltar mchod pa byas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa nyan nus par 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs
529a5(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gtong ba de lta bu la gnas nas/ bla na med pa
529a6(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu bsgrubs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa'ang yongs su dris so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
529a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ tshong dpon
529b1(nyi khri): gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams dang shing rta lnga brgya blangs so/ /blangs nas kyang rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rigs kyi bu de nyid la slar byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems
529b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa stan las langs nas bdag gi khyim du song ngo / /nyi ma'ang nub par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
529b3(nyi khri): chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gyur to/ /bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la/ 'dug pa'am/ nyal ba ni legs pa ma yin la/ bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ byang chub
529b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa bdag gi khyim nas chos 'chad pa'i phyir ma byung gi bar du 'greng ba'am/ 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis bsdad
529b5(nyi khri): do snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa lo bdun du snyoms par zhugs pa gcig la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting
529b6(nyi khri): nge 'dzin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa las byung ba stong phrag grangs med tshad med pa las gnas par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
529b7(nyi khri): po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'ang lo bdun du 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi bskyed/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / ro la chags pa ni
530a1(nyi khri): bskyed kyi/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rigs kyi bu de gang la 'dug nas chos
530a2(nyi khri): 'chad pa'i chos kyi stan gding bar bya na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'di langs pa ji tsam na mthong snyam pa dang / sa phyogs
530a3(nyi khri): gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa 'chad pa'i sa phyogs de'ang phyag dar
530a4(nyi khri): byas shing chag chag gis btab la/ me tog sna tshogs kyis kun tu gtor to snyam pa las bsam pa gzhan med do/ /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de
530a5(nyi khri): rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rjes su slob cing spyod lam gnyis po de nyid kyis sdod cing 'khod do/ /bya ba thams cad
530a6(nyi khri): kyang de dang rjes su mthun par byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ste/ langs nas kyang
530a7(nyi khri): grong khyer gyi dbus su chos 'chad do zhes zer ba'i sgra nam mkha' las byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas thos so/ /de nas byang chub
530b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu bas sgra de thos nas/ dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes par gyur nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo
530b2(nyi khri): lnga brgya po rnams dang lhan cig tu sa phyogs de byi dor byas nas/ chos kyi stan rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'ang bting ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po thams
530b3(nyi khri): cad kyis bdag cag gi bla gos lus las phud de stan gang la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'dug ste/ chod 'chad pa'i chos kyi stan der bla gos
530b4(nyi khri): lnga brgya stan du bting ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba/ sa phyogs de chag chag gdab pa'i phyir kho ra khor yug tu chu btsal na/ sa
530b5(nyi khri): phyogs de chag chag gdab pa'i chu bdud sdig to can gyis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba chu ma rnyed nas/ sems la sdug bsngal ba dang /
530b6(nyi khri): yid mi dga' ba dang / sems gzhan du gyur te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med par gyur cing / mchod pa de'ang ngan par 'gyur ba de lta bur bya ba'i phyir/ chu de med pa byas pas chu ma rnyed
530b7(nyi khri): par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gyur to/ /'o na bdag gi lus phug ste/ sa phyogs 'di khrag gis chag chag gdab
531a1(nyi khri): bo| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste/ rdul de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i lus la ma
531a2(nyi khri): rung bar gyur na bdag gi lus nges par 'jig par 'gyur ba 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus don med par chud zos pa bas 'di ltar byas na bdag gi lus med par gyur kyang bla'o/ /
531a3(nyi khri): bdag gi lus stong phrag du ma 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhi dang / 'dod pa'i mtshan mar 'khor ba na yang dang yang du 'khor ba'i tshe chud zos kyi/ gnas 'di lta bu dag tu
531a4(nyi khri): ni ma song ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba mtshon rnon po zhig thogs te bdag gi lus kun phug nas/ sa phyogs de kun bdag gi
531a5(nyi khri): khrag gis chag chag btab bo/ /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rjes su slob
531a6(nyi khri): pas/ thams cad kyis mtshon rnon po blangs nas/ bdag cag gi lus phug ste/ sa phyogs de bdag cag gi khrag gis chag chag btab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
531a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang / bu mo de rnams kyang sems gzhan du ma gyur te/ bdud sdig to can gyis dge ba'i phyogs la bar chad bya ba'i skabs rnyed par yang
531b1(nyi khri): ma gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di de ltar chos 'dod pa dang / de ltar yi dam
531b2(nyi khri): la brtan pa dang / go cha chen po bgos pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
531b3(nyi khri): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas 'di ltar sems can rnams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las yongs su thar bar bya bar sems pa
531b4(nyi khri): de ngo mtshar che'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de thams cad lha'i tsan+dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs so/ /sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug kyang lha'i tsan+dan gyi chu'i dri bsam gyis
531b5(nyi khri): mi khyab pa dpag tshad brgya'i bar du bsung bar byas so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras
531b6(nyi khri): so| |rigs kyi bu khyod kyis brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / khyod chos 'dod pa dang / chos 'tshol ba bla na med pa de legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon gyi de
531b7(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang / brtson 'grus de lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa de lta bus
532a1(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrubs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du
532a2(nyi khri): gyur to/ /bdag gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i chos kyi stan ni bting zin/ sa phyogs 'di'ang chag chag btab cing phyag
532a3(nyi khri): dar byas zin na/ sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog gis gtor ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa chos 'chad pa la gtor
532a4(nyi khri): ba'i me tog bdag gis ga las rnyed snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras
532a5(nyi khri): so| |rigs kyi bu/ lha'i me tog mnad ra ba 'di rnams khyer la/ 'di dag gis sa phyogs 'di khyod kyis me tog gis gtor cig /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
532a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa chos kyi stan la 'dug cing / chos 'chad pa la'ang gtor cig ces nas/ des lha'i me tog mnad ra ba khal bzhi brgya de la byin no/ /de
532a7(nyi khri): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas me tog de dag blangs nas/ me tog kha cig ni sa phyogs der gtor/ me tog kha cig ni byang chub
532b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa'i phyir bzhag go / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa lo bdun lon
532b2(nyi khri): pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ chos kyi stan gang na 'dug pa der song nas/ stan bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor/ mdun du byas nas
532b3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas/ byang
532b4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la me tog gi mchod pa byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/
532b5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa mthong nas/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa yid la byed pa rtse gcig tu gyur
532b6(nyi khri): pa de lta bu'i bde ba rab tu thob par gyur/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'chad pa ni/ 'di lta ste/
532b7(nyi khri): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad rnam par dben pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dben no/ /
533a1(nyi khri): chos thams cad mi g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi g.yo ba nyid do/ /chos thams cad sems pa med pa'i phyir /
533a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sems pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad mnan pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnan pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams
533a3(nyi khri): cad ro gcig pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa
533a4(nyi khri): nyid do/ /chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
533a5(nyi khri): pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
533a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /ri rab lta bur rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid do/ /nam mkha' ltar rnam par mi
533a7(nyi khri): rtog pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa nyid do/ /gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /de
533b1(nyi khri): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /sa'i khams mtha'
533b2(nyi khri): yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab
533b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /nam mkha'i dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /rdo rje lta bur chos thams cad mnyam
533b4(nyi khri): pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig pa med pa nyid do/ /
533b5(nyi khri): chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
533b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/
533b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de bzhin du 'dug pa las/
534a1(nyi khri): de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nges par byung ngo / /chos thams cad
534a2(nyi khri): rnam par dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad sems pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
534a3(nyi khri): dang / chos thams cad mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting
534a4(nyi khri): nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas pa
534a5(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab rnam pa sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i
534a6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya
534a7(nyi khri): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i
534b1(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi phyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting
534b2(nyi khri): nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
534b3(nyi khri): chos thams cad spyod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa
534b4(nyi khri): na rab tu thob par 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stong phrag drug brgya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas rab tu thob par gyur to/ /shes
534b5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ chos kyis 'phags pa'i le'u ste/ bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
534b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs
534b7(nyi khri): dang / mtshams rnams dang / bla 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang
535a1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mdun du byas pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / tshig
535a2(nyi khri): 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad pa mthong ba ni/ dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na nga byang
535a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mdun du byas shing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / tshig 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di
535a4(nyi khri): dag nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'chad cing 'dug pa lta bu'o/ /de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pas/ thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par gyur
535a5(nyi khri): to| |tshe rabs thams cad du'ang nam yang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar gyur to/ /tshe rabs thams cad du gang dang gang du na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yod pa'i 'jig rten
535a6(nyi khri): gyi khams de dang der skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon sum du chos nyan to/ /chung ngu na rmi lam na'ang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba
535a7(nyi khri): dang / chos nyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang mi 'bral lo/ /de mi khom pa thams cad spangs shing dal 'byor dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
535b1(nyi khri): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub
535b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'o/ /de bas na/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
535b3(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
535b4(nyi khri): pa| kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung zhig /chongs shig /lhogs
535b5(nyi khri): shig / kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan la'ang rgyas bar ston cig /kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
535b6(nyi khri): kyis kyang mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ bsgrag par bya/ bstan par bya/ bshad par bya/ kha ton du bya/ rab tu bsgom
535b7(nyi khri): par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis chung du na/ glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal bar bris te me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng pa dang /
536a1(nyi khri): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra khor yug tu'ang mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa du mas
536a2(nyi khri): mchod cing / rim gror bya/ bla mar bya/ bsti stang du bya/ mchod par bya/ brjed par bya/ gus par bya ste/ 'di ni ngas rjes su gtams pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga'
536a3(nyi khri): bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rag lus ba'i phyir ro/ /
536a4(nyi khri): kun dga' bo/ de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /bde
536a5(nyi khri): bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun
536a6(nyi khri): dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin te/ khyod kyis yongs su spyad do/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis byams pa'i lus kyi las yid du 'ong zhing / yid du mi 'ong
536a7(nyi khri): ba ma yin pa dang / byams pa'i ngag gi las yid du 'ong zhing / yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / byams pa'i yid kyi las yid du 'ong zhing / yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pas yongs
536b1(nyi khri): su spyad do/ /de bas na kun dga' bo/ nga da ltar lus 'di la gnas shing 'tsho skyong ba na/ gang khyod kyis byams pa dang / dga' ba dang / bla mar byas pa de/ nga 'das pa'i 'og tu khyod
536b2(nyi khri): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gyis shig / kun dga' bo/ khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du gtad cing rjes su gtad kyi/ khyod kyis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
536b3(nyi khri): 'di med par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig / kun dga' bo/ ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na gnas pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bzhugs par rig par
536b4(nyi khri): bya| de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
536b5(nyi khri): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgrog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'dri ba dang / rim gror byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / bsti stang du byed pa dang /
536b6(nyi khri): mchod par byed pa dang / rjed par byed pa dang / gus par byed cing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang /
536b7(nyi khri): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pas mchod par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba/
537a1(nyi khri): chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring bar 'khod par rig par bya'o/ /bcom
537a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das thugs dgyes pas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal chen po'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa
537a3(nyi khri): 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka ta ya na chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa re ba ta dang / tshe dang
537a4(nyi khri): ldan pa rA hu la dang / 'khor rnam pa bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' bar gyur
537a5(nyi khri): to| |shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga
537a6(nyi khri): pa/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
537a7(nyi khri): rgyas rnams kyi yum rdzogs so/ / //mang+ga laM/ //
